description: In Linux systems, monitor for newly executed processes from shared memory directories such as `/dev/shm`, `/run/shm`, `/var/run`, and `/var/lock`.(Citation: Elastic Binary Executed from Shared Memory Directory)

external_references.description: Elastic. (n.d.). Binary Executed from Shared Memory Directory. Retrieved September 24, 2024.
external_references.source_name: Elastic Binary Executed from Shared Memory Directory
